files.name: feoc_clause_skeletons.v1.0.json
files.role: Clause skeleton library containing short-form and long-form replacement clause templates

files.name: feoc_consequence_map.v1.0.json
files.role: Maps control-vector hits to consequence classes, UI states, and required actions

files.name: feoc_control_vectors_refactored.v1.0.json
files.role: Authoritative FEOC control vectors with control_id mappings

files.name: feoc_global_rules.v1.0.json
files.role: Global precedence, override, and fatality rules applied across all analyses

files.name: feoc_replacement_map.v1.0.json
files.role: Maps consequence outputs to replacement clause skeleton IDs

files.name: feoc_statute_citations_v1.0.json
files.role: Single source of truth for FEOC statutes, regulations, guidance, and canonical URLs

files.name: normalization/feoc_concept_taxonomy.v1.0.json
files.role: Frozen concept taxonomy (concept_id list) used for semantic normalization

files.name: normalization/feoc_concept_definitions.v1.0.1.json
files.role: Definitions/boundaries for each concept_id (human-readable, used to constrain normalization)

files.name: normalization/feoc_normalization_output_schema.v1.0.1.json
files.role: JSON Schema for normalization layer output (clause_spans + normalized + evidence_map + model_metadata)

files.name: evaluation/feoc_control_evaluator_spec.v1.0.1.json
files.role: Deterministic evaluator spec: converts normalization (concept hits) into control hits

notes: v1.0.1 updates normalization inputs: concept definitions are separated from the normalization output schema to prevent schema/ontology confusion. All analysis must reference only the files listed here.
